英文品名: RHEAMED Vida Blood Glucose Monitoring System

RHEAMED Vida Micro Blood Glucose test strip package contains: 25 pieces of a Blood Glucose test strip and one code strip, 50 pieces of a Blood Glucose test strip and one code strip.4. RHEAMED Vida Micro Blood Glucose Meter.
